verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> the feast <S%G1859><s%> of unleavened bread <S%G106><s%> drew nigh <S%G1448><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> is called <S%G3004><s%> the Passover <S%G3957><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the chief priests <S%G749><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the scribes <S%G1122><s%> sought <S%G2212><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> they might put him <S%G846><s%> to death <S%G337><s%>; for <S%G1063><s%> they feared <S%G5399><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Judas <S%G2455><s%> who was called <S%G1941><s%> Iscariot <S%G2469><s%>, being <S%G5607><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the number <S%G706><s%> of the twelve <S%G1427><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he went away <S%G565><s%>, and communed <S%G4814><s%> with the chief priests <S%G749><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> captains <S%G4755><s%>, how <S%G4459><s%> he might deliver <S%G3860><s%> him <S%G846><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> they were glad <S%G5463><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> covenanted <S%G4934><s%> to give <S%G1325><s%> him <S%G846><s%> money <S%G694><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he consented <S%G1843><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> sought <S%G2212><s%> opportunity <S%G2120><s%> to deliver <S%G3860><s%> him <S%G846><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%> in the absence of <S%G817><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%>.
And <S%G1161><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> of unleavened bread <S%G1722><s%> came <S%G2064><s%>, on which <S%G3739><s%> the passover <S%G3957><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> be sacrificed <S%G2380><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he sent <S%G649><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> John <S%G2491><s%>, saying <S%G2036><s%>, Go <S%G4198><s%> and make ready <S%G2090><s%> for us <S%G2254><s%> the passover <S%G3957><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> we may eat <S%G5315><s%>.
And <S%G1161><s%> they said <S%G2036><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Where <S%G4226><s%> wilt thou <S%G2309><s%> that we make ready <S%G2090><s%>?

And <S%G1161><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Behold <S%G2400><s%>, when ye <S%G5216><s%> are entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the city <S%G4172><s%>, there shall <S%G4876><s%> meet <S%G4876><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> bearing <S%G941><s%> a pitcher <S%G2765><s%> of water <S%G5204><s%>; follow <S%G190><s%> him <S%G846><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the house <S%G3614><s%> whereinto <S%G3757><s%> he goeth <S%G1531><s%>.

And he <S%G2548><s%> will show <S%G1166><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> a large <S%G3173><s%> upper room <S%G508><s%> furnished <S%G4766><s%>: there <S%G1563><s%> make ready <S%G2090><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> they went <S%G565><s%>, and found <S%G2147><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> he had said <S%G2046><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> they made ready <S%G2090><s%> the passover <S%G3957><s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> the hour <S%G5610><s%> was come <S%G1096><s%>, he sat down <S%G377><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the apostles <S%G652><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, With desire <S%G1939><s%> I have desired <S%G1937><s%> to eat <S%G5315><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> passover <S%G3957><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> I <S%G3165><s%> suffer <S%G3958><s%>:

for <S%G1063><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, <S%G3754><s%> I shall not <S%G3765><s%> eat <S%G5315><s%> it <S%G2193><s%>, until it be fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he received <S%G1209><s%> a cup <S%G4221><s%>, and when he had given thanks <S%G2168><s%>, he said <S%G2036><s%>, Take <S%G2983><s%> this <S%G5124><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> divide <S%G1266><s%> it among yourselves <S%G1438><s%>:

for <S%G1063><s%> I <S%G3756><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G3754><s%>, I <S%G3756><s%> shall not <S%G3361><s%> drink <S%G4095><s%> from henceforth of <S%G575><s%> the fruit <S%G1081><s%> of <S%G575><s%> the vine <S%G288><s%>, until <S%G2193><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> shall come <S%G2064><s%>.

And the cup <S%G4221><s%> in like <S%G5615><s%> manner <S%G2532><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> supper <S%G1172><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, This <S%G5124><s%> cup <S%G4221><s%> is the new <S%G2537><s%> covenant <S%G1242><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> blood <S%G129><s%>, even that which <S%G3588><s%> is poured <S%G1632><s%> out for <S%G5228><s%> you <S%G5216><s%>.

But <S%G4133><s%> behold <S%G2400><s%>, the hand <S%G5495><s%> of him that <S%G3588><s%> betrayeth <S%G3860><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> is with <S%G3326><s%> me <S%G1700><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the table <S%G5132><s%>.

For <S%G2532><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> indeed <S%G3303><s%> goeth <S%G4198><s%>, as <S%G2596><s%> it hath been determined <S%G3724><s%>: but <S%G4133><s%> woe <S%G3759><s%> unto that <S%G1565><s%> man <S%G444><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> he is betrayed <S%G3860><s%>!

And <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G846><s%> began <S%G756><s%> to question <S%G4802><s%> among <S%G4314><s%> themselves <S%G1438><s%>, which5101, 687 of <S%G1537><s%> them <S%G846><s%> it was <S%G1498><s%> that should <S%G3195><s%> do <S%G4238><s%> this thing <S%G5124><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> there arose also <S%G2532><s%> a contention <S%G5379><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, which <S%G5101><s%> of them <S%G846><s%> was <S%G1511><s%> accounted <S%G1380><s%> to be <S%G1511><s%> greatest <S%G3187><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, The kings <S%G935><s%> of the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> have lordship <S%G2961><s%> over them <S%G846><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> they that <S%G3588><s%> have authority over <S%G1850><s%> them <S%G846><s%> are called <S%G2564><s%> Benefactors <S%G2110><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> shall not <S%G3756><s%> be so <S%G3779><s%>: but <S%G235><s%> he that <S%G3588><s%> is the greater <S%G3187><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>, let him become <S%G1096><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> the younger <S%G3501><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> he that is chief <S%G2233><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> he that <S%G3588><s%> doth serve <S%G1247><s%>.

But ye <S%G5210><s%> are <S%G2075><s%> they that <S%G3588><s%> have continued <S%G1265><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> me <S%G1700><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> temptations <S%G3986><s%>;
and I <S%G2504><s%> appoint <S%G1303><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> a kingdom <S%G932><s%>, even as <S%G2531><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> appointed <S%G1303><s%> unto me <S%G3427><s%>,

that <S%G2443><s%> ye may eat <S%G2068><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> drink <S%G4095><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> table <S%G5132><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> ye shall sit <S%G2523><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> thrones <S%G2362><s%> judging <S%G2919><s%> the twelve <S%G1427><s%> tribes <S%G5443><s%> of Israel <S%G2474><s%>.

1161, 2962, Exodus36 Simon <S%G4613><s%>, Simon <S%G4613><s%>, behold <S%G2400><s%>, Satan <S%G4567><s%> asked <S%G1809><s%> to have you <S%G5209><s%>, that he might sift <S%G4617><s%> you as <S%G5613><s%> wheat <S%G4621><s%>:

but <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> made supplication <S%G1189><s%> for <S%G4012><s%> thee <S%G4675><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> fail <S%G1587><s%> not <S%G3361><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> do thou <S%G4218><s%>, when once thou <S%G4771><s%> hast turned again <S%G1994><s%>, establish <S%G4741><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> they said <S%G2036><s%>, Lord <S%G2962><s%>, behold <S%G2400><s%>, here <S%G5602><s%> are two <S%G1417><s%> swords <S%G3162><s%>. And <S%G1161><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, It is <S%G2076><s%> enough <S%G2425><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he came out <S%G1831><s%>, and went <S%G4198><s%>, as <S%G2596><s%> his custom <S%G1485><s%> was <S%G1519><s%>, unto the mount <S%G3735><s%> of Olives <S%G1636><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> also <S%G1161><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G846><s%> was parted <S%G645><s%> from <S%G575><s%> them <S%G846><s%> about <S%G5616><s%> a stone <S%G3037><s%>'s cast <S%G1000><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> he kneeled <S%G5087><s%> down <S%G1119><s%> and prayed <S%G4336><s%>,

saying <S%G3004><s%>, Father <S%G3962><s%>, if <S%G1487><s%> thou be willing <S%G1014><s%>, remove <S%G3911><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> cup <S%G4221><s%> from <S%G575><s%> me <S%G1700><s%>: nevertheless <S%G4133><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> will <S%G2307><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> thine <S%G4674><s%>, be done <S%G1096><s%>.
And <S%G1161><s%> there appeared <S%G3700><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%> an angel <S%G32><s%> from <S%G575><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>, strengthening <S%G1765><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> being <S%G1096><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> an agony <S%G74><s%> he prayed <S%G4336><s%> more earnestly <S%G1617><s%>; and <S%G1161><s%> his <S%G846><s%> sweat <S%G2402><s%> became <S%G1096><s%> as it were <S%G5616><s%> great drops <S%G2361><s%> of blood <S%G129><s%> falling down <S%G2597><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the ground <S%G1093><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when he rose up <S%G450><s%> from <S%G575><s%> his prayer <S%G4335><s%>, he came <S%G2064><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> the disciples <S%G3101><s%>, and found <S%G2147><s%> them <S%G846><s%> sleeping <S%G2837><s%> for <S%G575><s%> sorrow <S%G3077><s%>,

But <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Judas <S%G2455><s%>, betrayest thou <S%G3860><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> with a kiss <S%G5370><s%>?

And when <S%G1161><s%> they that were <S%G3588><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> him <S%G846><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> what would follow <S%G2071><s%>, they said <S%G2036><s%>, <S%G846><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%>, shall <S%G1487><s%> we smite <S%G3960><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> the sword <S%G3162><s%>?
